
	embedXcode
	----------------------------------
	Embedded Computing on Xcode 4.2


	© Rei VILO, 2010-2012
	CC = BY NC SA

    http://sites.google.com/site/vilorei/arduino/20--arduino-makefile-for-xcode

    https://github.com/rei-vilo/mpideOnXCode42
